Class Gomoku

  • java.lang.Object

extends javafx.application.Application

    Kris Tran

      • numberInLine

        public static int numberInLine(int[][] board,
                               int row,
                               int column,
                               int xcord,
                               int ycord)
        return the number of pieces of the same color in a straight line
        Parameters:
        board - a two-dimensional array representing the game board
        row - the row of the currently played piece
        column - the column of the currently played piece
        xcord - the direction moved in the x-cordinate
        ycord - the direction moved in the y-cordinate
        Returns:
        the number of pieces of the same color in a straight line

        public static boolean isLegal(int[][] board,
                              int row,
                              int column,
                              int player,
                              int winNumber,
                              boolean isEnded)
        check if the move is legal or not and return the according boolean result
        Parameters:
        board - a two-dimensional array representing the game board
        row - the row of the currently played piece
        column - the column of the currently played piece
        player - the player in turn
        winNumber - the number of pieces of the same color in a straight line
        isEnded - the boolean value of whether the game has ended
        Returns:
        whether the move is legal or not
